summary: The perfect small castle with all the amenities. Every type of crafting station, dragonpriest mask display, shrine of talos, and a vault with a unique cuirass and sword.
descriptionHtml:
Don't be shy downloaders! Let me know your thoughts! Just be constructive!Thanks!
Requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCS!

*Note: I might release some more unique armors in the future*

Yeah, I know it's just another house mod. I have tried A TON of house mods and none of them worked just the way I wanted. It is not too big and not too small. It is strong enough to keep dragons out and cozy enough to keep people in. No new scripts or lag. I am not just saying this because it is my mod, but this is my favorite player house I have tried.

The house has the following:
Anvil Forge, Alchemy Table, Enchanting Table, Enchanting Staff Table, Sharpening Wheel, Armor Table and a cooking spit. Outside-Smelter, Chopping block, and Stable.
Unique Merchant- Ibuy-ur-stuf- Buys all types of items and starts with 10,000 gold.
Six Mannequins
Weapon Rack
Dragonpriest Mask Display Altar
Shrine of Talos
Tons of storage, lost count of treasure chests and display cases. Most of the chests are uniqely named.
Vault room. Key can be stolen off of the merchant or found in a hidden spot....you have to find it yourself! DO NOT POST WHERE THE "HIDEY SPOT" IS!!! Unique cuirass and weapon in the vault room.
Plus, other Easter eggs...

Like most other house mods- in order to move your spouse, children or followers in, you need to use another mod.

*NOTE* The Konahrik mask can be put on the bust, but you have to be behind the altar- check the images.

*Please, if you do not have anything nice to say do not post anything.*
Permissions-You can use my mod and it's resources in your mod ONLY IF YOU ASK ME AND I APPROVE! (Ofcourse if you credit me as well.) But do not hesistate to ask me! I want to help the modding community.
Credits- Bethesda making awesome games and modder's tools.
My friend Avatar1971 for helping me test the mod.

My other mods: Skyrim
Cursed Camelot and Excalibur- (with my friend Avatar1971)
Ragnaroks Revenge
Acadian Race
Fallout New Vegas- New Camelot
author: ApokKnight
